name: The traitor from ancient Rome
description:
This is my second GameJam . 

The traitor from ancient Rome . I had no idea for a name.

Controls : 

 - Move - WASD  or ARROWS

 - PickUp Items - E

 - Move to rotate and Right Click to attack

 - ESCAPE  to pause the game

If you cant finish the game in the first try , try more times , the enemies are random so you might get easier enemies next time.

Story (In game story)

(Short) You were caught stealing money from people .
